Plot: A New York socialite, deeply troubled and in denial, arrives in San Francisco to impose upon her sister. She looks a million, but isn't bringing money, peace, or love...
Title: Blue Jasmine
Actors: Cate Blanchett, Joy Carlin, Richard Conti, Glen Caspillo
tomatoConsensus: Woody Allen's Blue Jasmine finds the director in peak late-period form -- and benefiting from a superb cast led by Cate Blanchett.
